Item.Name: Aloha Isle
Item.Content:
Aloha Isle in Adventureland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Aloha Isle

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002426.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Aloha Isle is home to the most famous thing, the Dole Whip. This non-dairy soft serve treat is absolutely the best on a hot day, which is pretty much all of the time in Florida.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Auntie Gravity's Galactic Goodies
Item.Content:
Auntie Gravity's Galactic Goodies in Tomorrowland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Auntie Gravity's Galactic Goodies

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002444.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Come back down to Earth for a sweet treat: soft-serve cones, sundaes, floats made with soda or iced coffee, smoothies, muffins, fruit and fountain soft drinks. Coffee, tea, hot chocolate and assorted cereals with milk are also available.
  Cuisine: American

Private Label Champagne & Wines
17010706
Enchantée Champagne Brut (Enchanted) Nicolas Feuillatte Champagne Brut, Chouilly - Per Glass - $19.00 / Per Bottle - $79.00

This fine French Champagne is a blend of Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Pinot Meunier. Lightly floral, with elegant notes of ripe apple and glazed apricot, layered with almond, pie crust, and honey. Delicate on the palate with a lively mousse and a creamy texture

17010698
L’ombre de la Bête Chardonnay (Shadow of the Beast) Georges Duboeuf, Emile Beranger, Pouilly-Fuissé Burgundy - Per Glass - $17.00 / Per Bottle - $75.00

Pouilly-Fuissé is one of the most prestigious wines from the Maconnais region of Burgundy.  This wine is 100% Chardonnay and has been partially aged in french Oak which gives the wine a slight hint of almonds and cinnamon on the nose. Delicate lime and green apple flavors linger on the palate

17532456
Enchantée Rosé (Enchanted) Gérard Bertrand Syrah/Grenache Rosé, Languedoc - Per Glass - $11.00 / Per Bottle - $49.00

This enchanted Rosé from the Languedoc region in the South of France is a blend of Syrah and Grenache. This wine is succulently fruity on the palate with rich notes of ripe cherry, muddled strawberry, and a crisp finish

17010725
L’ombre de la Bête Vin Rouge (Shadow of the Beast) Jean-Luc Colombo, Les Bartavelles, Châteauneuf-du-Pape, Rhône Valley - Per Glass - $19.00 / Per Bottle - $79.00

Château-du-Pape is one of the most renowned appellations of the southern part of the Rhone Valley. This wine is a blend of Syrah, Grenache, and Mourvedre. A powerful and full-bodied wine with rich notes of blueberry, wild herbs, and lots of spice. The palate is mature and rich with velvety tannins, ending with a long finish

Item.Name: Casey's Corner
Item.Content:
Casey's Corner in Main Street, U.S.A., Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Casey's Corner

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002458.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Hit it out of the park with American baseball favorites: hot dogs, nachos, corn dog nuggets, French fries, cotton candy, and Cracker Jack. You may even catch Jim tickling the ivories to ragtime tunes outside. Soft drinks are also available.

Item.Name: Columbia Harbour House
Item.Content:
Columbia Harbour House in Liberty Square, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Columbia Harbour House

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001399.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Reel in fried fish, shrimp or chicken baskets, lobster rolls, New England clam chowder, grilled salmon, vegetarian chili and salads. Specialty sandwiches include the Anchors Aweigh, made with white tuna, and the Lighthouse, made with hummus and broccoli slaw. Kids can enjoy macaroni and cheese, chicken nuggets and more. Top off your meal with seasonal cobbler, yogurt and fountain drinks.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Details, tips, and information for Cosmic Ray's Starlight Café

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002470.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Explore a galaxy of hot food choices, from BBQ pork sandwiches and chicken breast nuggets to Angus burgers and hot dogs. Customize your meal at the topping bar before finding a seat and enjoying the alien entertainment from Sonny Eclipse!

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Item.Name: Gaston's Tavern
Item.Content:
Gaston's Tavern in Fantasyland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Gaston's Tavern

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/16767318.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
The manliest of manly places, Gaston's Tavern serves up such satisfying snacks as roasted pork shanks, mixed vegetables cups, hummus with chips, fruit cups and warm cinnamon rolls. Plus, enjoy refreshing beverages, like LeFou's Brew—the restaurant's signature non-alcoholic drink.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Jungle Navigation Co. LTD Skipper Canteen
Item.Content:
Jungle Navigation Co. LTD Skipper Canteen in Adventureland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Jungle Navigation Co. LTD Skipper Canteen

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/18185631.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Hungry for adventure? Savor the tropical cuisine of this exotic outpost.
Tom says...
I am overjoyed that Disney re-evaluated plans to 'dumb-down' the menu and took the opportunity to make some dishes more inviting, while still leaving some (and even adding some) adventurous additions. All-in-all I still believe this is the best table service restaurant at the Magic Kingdom, and maybe the best restaurant at Walt Disney World.
  Book Jungle Navigation Co. LTD Skipper Canteen Dining Reservations
  Rating: 7 out of 7 (yeah, 7)
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Cuisine: African/Asian/Latin
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Liberty Tree Tavern
Item.Content:
Liberty Tree Tavern in Liberty Square, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Liberty Tree Tavern

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001819.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Pay tribute to our founding fathers as you dine at this stately colonial-style inn serving traditional New England-inspired fare. Please Pardon Our Patriotic Dust Hear ye, hear ye! Liberty Tree Tavern will be closed for planned maintenance starting July 6, 2015 with a planned reopening currently scheduled for November 20, 2015. We beg your pardon for any inconvenience this refurbishment may cause!
WDWNT says...
Liberty Tree Tavern is always a solid choice for a sit down meal either for lunch or dinner. My favorite thing to do here for lunch is order the fried cheese and clam chowder and then dip the cheese in the chowder. It's amazing. The turkey platter is also excellent. Dinner is a family style, all-you-care-to-enjoy extravaganza with classics like mashed potatoes, turkey, macaroni and cheese, rolls, salad, beef...all of which are very good. The gravy here is probably my favorite gravy ever...and I really love gravy.
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Main Street Bakery
Item.Content:
Main Street Bakery in Main Street, U.S.A., Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Main Street Bakery

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002590.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Stop off on the way down Main Street, and top off your day with a cup of coffee or even a tasty treat! Enjoy Starbucks® Espresso, specialty beverages, savory breakfast sandwiches and an assortment of delicious Disney-made sweets.
WDWNT says...
It's Starbucks. I personally enjoy being able to get my morning latte and afternoon Very Berry Hibiscus Refresher here.
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Cuisine: American/Bakery

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002610.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Rustle up some grub with your Slue-Foot Sue at this Old West saloon! Tell tall tales over BBQ pork sandwiches, Angus burgers, Southwest chicken salads and more—all before bouncing into the sky on a sugar high with desserts and soft drinks.

19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Item.Name: Pinocchio Village Haus
Item.Content:
Pinocchio Village Haus in Fantasyland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Pinocchio Village Haus

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002618.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Real boys and girls can feast on Italian favorites at this quaint cottage: flatbread pizzas, meatball subs, macaroni and cheese, Mediterranean salad and more. Finish your meal with gelato, yogurt, chocolate cake and iced coffee or other beverages.
WDWNT says...
Anything that was decent on the menu was removed. Do not recommend.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Allergy Disclaimer
19092718
PLEASE NOTE: -

Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. It is ultimately our Guests' discretion to make an informed choice based upon their individual dietary needs.

Item.Name: Plaza Ice Cream Parlor
Item.Content:
Plaza Ice Cream Parlor in Main Street, U.S.A., Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Plaza Ice Cream Parlor

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/91955.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Indulge in hand-scooped ice cream at this sweetly nostalgic parlor on Main Street, U.S.A. Savor floats, fresh waffle-bowl sundaes smothered in hot fudge and Mickey cones with chocolate ears! Fat- and sugar-free options are also available.
WDWNT says...
It's just ice cream and the line is usually nuts. Try Storybook Treats instead.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Prince Eric's Village Market
Item.Content:
Prince Eric's Village Market in Fantasyland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Prince Eric's Village Market

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/17517004.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Revitalize your appetite at this energetic stand where you can find healthy foods like whole and cut fruit, veggies & dip and hummus & chips, in addition to icy cool treats like shaved ice—available in a rainbow of refreshing fruit flavors.
WDWNT says...
I like that I can get a Snow Cone in Magic Kingdom...but they aren't as good as the ones you can get from your local shaved ice place for $1. Go get a brownie sundae at Storybook Treats instead.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Sleepy Hollow
Item.Content:
Sleepy Hollow in Liberty Square, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Sleepy Hollow

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002140.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Fill the hollow in your belly with a sweet treat at this quaint brick cottage by Cinderella Castle: freshly made fruit waffle sandwiches, funnel cake, ice cream, floats and slushes. Savory waffle sandwiches and coffee are also available.
WDWNT says...
People generally rave about the waffle sandwiches. I think they are over-rated, but if you must, go for the fruit and nutella.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Storybook Treats
Item.Content:
Storybook Treats in Fantasyland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Storybook Treats

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002602.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Find your fairy tale ending in a fudge brownie sundae. Other sundae choices are hot fudge cookie and strawberry shortcake. Soft-serve ice cream, chocolate chunk cookies, milkshakes, floats, and hot and cold beverages are also available.
WDWNT says...
A brownie sundae made with soft serve for just over $5. That's all you really need to know. Go get one. They're a perfect afternoon treat.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Sunshine Tree Terrace
Item.Content:
Sunshine Tree Terrace in Adventureland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Sunshine Tree Terrace

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002656.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Sip on some sunshine by the Enchanted Tiki Room with a raspberry lemonade slush, iced coffee float, fruit juice or specialty coffee. Try a citrus swirl—tasty soft-serve ice cream blended with frozen juice. Cookies, assorted chips and fountain drinks are also available.
WDWNT says...
Citrus Swirl is a fanboy favorite. It's very refreshing but seems to melt unusually fast. I like to get the iced coffee float, mostly as an excuse to have ice cream for breakfast.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: The Crystal Palace
Item.Content:
The Crystal Palace in Main Street, U.S.A., Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Crystal Palace

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002660.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Feast with friends from the Hundred-Acre Wood at this whimsical, all-you-care-to-enjoy buffet.
WDWNT says...
A bland and boring buffet. However, I think breakfast can be worth it for the decor and characters if that's your thing; it's hard to mess up a breakfast buffet.

Item.Content:
The Diamond Horseshoe in Liberty Square, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Diamond Horseshoe

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/247904.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Hit the trail for heaping helpings of classic American fare, made fast so you can head back out on the open range.
WDWNT says...
Under no circumstances should you waste your time and/or money here. You will be much better off indulging in the new menu nearby at Pecos Bill's or even eating the mediocre BBQ sandwiches from Tortuga Tavern.
  Book The Diamond Horseshoe Dining Reservations

Item.Name: The Friar's Nook
Item.Content:
The Friar's Nook in Fantasyland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Friar's Nook

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/114690.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Tuck into the Friar’s for some tasty fare, including macaroni & cheese, hot dogs, and veggies and chips with hummus, as well as beverages like lemonade slush and iced coffee.
WDWNT says...
They now have gourmet macaroni and cheese here. Some of the things they are doing with pot roast and such seem like a bit much to me. I am a big fan of ordering the regular macaroni and cheese and a hot dog and then making a macaroni and cheese hot dog.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: The Lunching Pad
Item.Content:
The Lunching Pad in Tomorrowland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Lunching Pad

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002664.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Fuel up before blast off with some out-of-this-world specialties including the Coney Island dog, topped with chili and served with apple slices or chips. Cream cheese pretzels, frozen carbonated beverages and soft drinks are also available.
WDWNT says...
There is no greater pick me up when you are winding down in the afternoon than a cream cheese pretzel and a frozen coke. I highly recommend. But stay away from the fancy hot dogs.

  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: The Plaza Restaurant
Item.Content:
The Plaza Restaurant in Main Street, U.S.A., Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for The Plaza Restaurant

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002670.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
This hidden gem at Magic Kingdom park is a favorite for its fantastic family-friendly fare and accessible location.
Tom says...
Overall, I am massively disappointed with Plaza Restaurant. This was a place I often visited once a trip and the experience we had food-wise was pretty awful. Our server was amazing, but the cuisine just wasn't as good as it had been in years past.
  Rating: 1.5 out of 7 (yeah, 7)
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Tomorrowland Terrace Restaurant
Item.Content:
Tomorrowland Terrace Restaurant in Tomorrowland, Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Tomorrowland Terrace Restaurant

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002668.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
There’s food in your future: Angus burgers, salads, sandwiches, pasta and more. Featured salads are beef with bleu cheese and citrus shrimp. Lobster rolls with house-made chips, pasta primavera and pasta Alfredo are among the other options. Kids can enjoy chicken nuggets or macaroni and cheese. Finish off your meal with carrot cake or yogurt.
Tom says...
The service is quick and the food is actually fantastic for what I would call a run-of-the-mill counter service. I would much prefer to eat here than fight the crowds at Cosmic Ray's Starlight Cafe, plus the options here are just much better. It may not be Be Our Guest, but Tomorrowland Terrace is a fine choice for a quick bite.
  Rating: 6 out of 7 (yeah, 7)
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Tony's Town Square Restaurant
Item.Content:
Tony's Town Square Restaurant in Main Street, U.S.A., Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Tony's Town Square Restaurant

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002678.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Everyone loves Italian, but this is no ordinary Italian restaurant! It’s where Lady and the Tramp had their first kiss.
WDWNT says...
The much maligned Main Street restaurant is one of my favorites. While they have one of the most disgusting marinara sauces I have ever tried, they have a truly delightful creamy alfredo-like sauce. Get the Chicken Parmesan and sub alfredo for marinara. The chicken is huge and juicy and perfectly cooked. The cream sauce makes it decadent and one of my favorite meals in all of Walt Disney World. Start your meal with a Ceasar Salad to round out the experience.
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Short code: tony
  Cuisine: American/Italian
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted
